Headline: Green Line Delays, Limited Service Between Garfield and 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays near Garfield; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Cottage Grove-bound Green Line trains are experiencing delays near Garfield.

We are running as much service possible with available staff.

As a result, Cottage Grove trains are operating in one section:

between Harlem and Garfield.


For service to Cottage Grove, alight trains at Garfield; shuttle train service to Cottage Grove can be boarded on the Harlem-bound platform side at Garfield.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays from Forest Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays from Forest Park.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
